resources.string:
-NOTICE: If your theme looks ugly, ask your theme developer to update it!!!

-NOTICE: To add/remove screens press MENU/Edit

-NOTICE: To enable ORIENTATION, disable PERSISTENCE.

-REMEMBER: You can hide apps from the drawer by using the custom catalogs (press menu key while the drawer is open)

Version 1.3.6:
--------------
-Option to lock/unlock desktop (press menu/more)
-Small fixes for some FCs
Version 1.3.5:
--------------
-Option to select different trash can positions/behaviors
-QuickActions window on longpress items.
-Support for drag-out and quickactions on the main dock too.
-Added the LauncherActions to the main ADD menu.
-Lots of fixes
